kinopio-meta

A simple static website for Kinopio meta pages.

still a wip, using https://www.11ty.io/docs/usage/ to be served from meta.kinopio.club

Install

git clone https://github.com/kinopio-club/kinopio-meta.git cd kinopio-meta npm install

Run

npm run serve http://localhost:8081
